data.message:
**** ATTENTION **** Coming at number 12 from my new Album "Chronic Logic" I give to you Reality.
Look i really do believe in speaking whats on the mind. People gimme alot of shit for it. But as i get older i realize that every day is passing by faster then it did as a kid. Theres not much time left for me to not talk. Aside from the explicit lyrics, my message was clear. This is Reality. Get used to it. Even better man you better make the best of it.
#ChronicLogic #MonsterMode #Truth #Reality
